item.title: 美国商业活动创两年多来最大增幅
item.description: 由于服务业需求强劲，美国 7 月初的商业活动以两年多来最快的速度加速，而衡量物价的指标则有所降温。【原文：US business activity accelerated in early July at the fastest pace in more than two years on stronger services demand, while a gauge of prices received cooled.】

item.title: 邦吉公司 82 亿美元的 Viterra 交易将获得欧盟有条件批准
item.description: 邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）计划以 82 亿美元收购 Viterra 公司（Viterra Inc.【原文：Bunge Global SA’s planned $8.2 billion buyout of Viterra Inc. is set to be approved by the European Union after concessions offered by the firms look to have appeased regulator concerns.】

item.title: 塞文特伦特英镑债券通过水务公司债务需求测试
item.description: 英国水务公司 Severn Trent Plc 的英镑债券销售需求旺盛，为陷入困境的英国水务行业注入了一针强心剂。【原文：British water utility Severn Trent Plc has pulled in strong demand for a pound bond sale in a boost for the beleaguered UK water sector.】

item.title: 前英国皇家经济委员会官员预测工党增税高达 250 亿英镑
item.description: 据前英格兰银行决策者迈克尔-桑德斯（Michael Saunders）称，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）可能会利用即将进行的工党财政继承审查，为即将到来的预算案增税高达 250 亿英镑（323 亿美元）提供理由。【原文：UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves could use an imminent review of Labour’s fiscal inheritance to justify tax increases of up to £25 billion ($32.3 billion) in the upcoming budget, according to former Bank of England policymaker Michael Saunders.】

item.title: 中国经济低迷令美国和欧洲石油在亚洲过于昂贵
item.description: 中国经济的不景气使美国和欧洲的石油在亚洲越来越没有竞争力，亚洲的炼油商将更青睐离家近的供应。【原文：China’s lackluster economy is helping to make oil from the US and Europe increasingly uncompetitive in Asia, where refiners are set to favor supply that’s closer to home.】

item.title: 印度考虑解除对部分中国企业的限制
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的官员说，印度政府正在权衡放宽对一些中国企业投资限制的方案，此举可能有助于这个南亚国家促进国内制造业的发展。【原文：India’s government is weighing options to ease investment restrictions on some Chinese firms, an official familiar with the matter said, a move that could help the South Asian nation boost its domestic manufacturing.】

item.title: 对冲基金组织另一笔 26 亿美元的乌克兰交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在与乌克兰政府进行债务重组谈判之前，一个在乌克兰投资的对冲基金集团正在组建一个小组，以重新制定约 26 亿美元的国内生产总值认股权证。【原文：A group of hedge funds invested in Ukraine is forming a group ahead of debt-restructuring talks with the government to rework some $2.6 billion of GDP warrants, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: KKR 部门被要求从植物油传播中删除黄油字样
item.description: KKR & Co. 旗下的食品公司 Upfield BV 被法院勒令停止销售其植物性涂抹酱，该涂抹酱的名称与荷兰语中的黄油相似。【原文：KKR & Co.’s food company Upfield BV was ordered by a court to stop marketing its plant-based spread with a name that has a likeness to the Dutch word for butter.】

item.title: Qatar Airways Says Airbus Delivering Jets Early as Links Improve
item.description: 两年前，卡塔尔航空公司与空中客车公司的关系岌岌可危。两家公司因卡塔尔航空公司所谓的飞机喷漆缺陷而对簿公堂，而空中客车公司则以取消其最忠实客户之一的大宗订单作为报复。【原文：Two years ago, Qatar Airways’ relationship with Airbus SE was on the ropes. The two companies were facing off in court over what the airline called a defective paint job on its planes, and Airbus retaliated by canceling a large order from one of its most loyal customers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯将把 "欧佩克+"补偿性石油减产延长至 2024-2025 年
item.description: 俄罗斯计划在今年 10 月和 11 月以及 2025 年 3 月至 9 月期间额外削减原油产量，以弥补超过欧佩克+配额的抽油量。【原文：Russia plans to make extra crude production cuts to compensate for pumping above its OPEC+ quota in October and November this year, then between March and September of 2025.】

item.title: 西班牙 7 月电价飙升四倍，制冷用电量激增
item.description: 西班牙的热浪增加了对空调的需求，导致天然气发电厂火力全开，电价上涨。【原文：A heat wave in Spain is boosting demand for air conditioning leading to higher power prices as gas plants fire up.】

item.title: 在缅甸受到审查的大亨在 Yoma Strategic 下台
item.description: 缅甸最富有的富豪之一塞尔吉-潘（Serge Pun）即将辞去在新加坡上市的野马战略控股有限公司（Yoma Strategic Holdings Ltd.）执行主席一职，因为他在自己的祖国仍然受到审查。【原文：Serge Pun, one of Myanmar’s richest tycoons, is stepping down as executive chairman of Singapore-listed Yoma Strategic Holdings Ltd., as he remains under scrutiny in his native country.】

item.title: 受台风影响，台湾交易所将继续休市两天
item.description: 台湾 2.5 万亿美元的股市周四将继续休市，这是罕见的第二天没有交易，因为致命的台风盖米在淹没菲律宾之后正在逼近。【原文：Taiwan’s $2.5 trillion stock market will remain closed on Thursday, marking a rare second day without trading as the deadly Typhoon Gaemi approaches after inundating the Philippines.】

item.title: 联合国称世界饥饿问题几乎没有改善
item.description: 联合国称，由于冲突、极端天气和经济挑战限制了人们获得食物的机会，世界在消除全球饥饿方面进展甚微。【原文：The world has made little progress in combating global hunger as conflict, extreme weather and economic challenges restrict people’s access to food, according to the United Nations.】

item.title: Värde 信贷公司看好商业地产和私人信贷领域的机遇
item.description: 另类投资公司韦德合伙人（Värde Partners）周三发布的一份展望报告称，随着信贷息差收窄至2008年以来最窄的一些水平，包括商业房地产抵押贷款和亚太地区私人信贷在内的领域将出现更多机会。【原文：As credit spreads tighten to some of the narrowest levels since 2008, alternative investment firm Värde Partners sees more opportunities in areas including commercial real estate mortgages and Asia Pacific private credit, according to an outlook report by the firm on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲最大涂料生产商警告欧盟，美国对中国征收化学品关税将刺激价格上涨
item.description: 欧洲最大的涂料生产商阿克苏诺贝尔公司（Akzo Nobel NV）警告说，欧洲和美国对中国化学品进口征收关税可能会抬高西方消费者的消费价格。【原文：Europe’s biggest paintmaker Akzo Nobel NV has warned that European and US tariffs on Chinese chemicals imports could drive up prices for Western consumers.】

item.title: GE Vernova 在叶片工厂发现制造 "偏差
item.description: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova Inc.）计划重新检查该公司生产的所有海上风力涡轮机叶片，因为该公司在一家工厂发现了 "材料偏差"，而该工厂供应的部件本月在一个在建项目中发生了断裂。【原文：GE Vernova Inc. plans to reinspect every offshore wind-turbine blade the company has ever produced after finding a “material deviation” at the factory that supplied the component that broke this month at a project under construction.】

item.title: 穆迪将泰晤士水务公司评级最高的债券降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 在英国水务监管机构将泰晤士水务公司置于所谓的 "周转监督机制 "之下后，穆迪评级公司将该公司的 A 级债务降至垃圾级。【原文：Moody’s Ratings lowered Thames Water’s class A debt to junk after the UK’s water regulator placed the company under a so-called turnaround oversight regime.】

item.title: 阿根廷的页岩雄心终将实现
item.description:
由于急需基础设施的建设，瓦卡穆埃尔塔地区的发展势头日益强劲。【原文：

There’s growing momentum in the Vaca Muerta thanks to the build-out of much-needed infrastructure.

】

item.title: 肯尼亚基础设施债券销售目标为 500 亿先令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，肯尼亚计划在下个月通过出售额外的基础设施债券来筹集 500 亿先令（约合 3.77 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Kenya plans to raise 50 billion shillings ($377 million) by selling additional infrastructure bonds next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度或将调整规则以遏制热流进入债券指数
item.description: 印度财政部一位高级官员表示，如果大量资金流入刺激了市场波动，印度可能会修改发行有资格在全球指数上交易的新债券的规则。【原文：India may amend rules for the issuance of new bonds that are eligible to trade on global indexes if large inflows spur volatility, according to a top finance ministry official.】

item.title: 印度政府计划稳步降低负债率至 50
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，印度政府计划在未来几年内将债务占国内生产总值的比例降至 50%左右，并维持在这一水平上下。【原文：India’s government plans to reduce its debt ratio to about 50% of gross domestic product over the coming years and sustain it around that level, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 您的一杯咖啡已经很贵了。现在情况更糟
item.description:
随着咖啡豆成本的飙升，世界各地的咖啡店为防止新一轮的涨价而厉行节约，但已无计可施。【原文：

Coffee shops around the world, pinching pennies to prevent another round of hikes, are running out of options as bean costs spike.

】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率降至 2 月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率上周回落至 2 月初以来的最低水平，而购房申请的进一步减少表明，可能需要更低的借贷成本来刺激需求。【原文：US mortgage rates eased last week to their lowest level since early February, while a further decline in home-purchase applications suggested even cheaper borrowing costs may be needed to stir demand.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在美国和欧洲股市乏善可陈之后，股市有望低开。Crowdstrike发现了导致上周IT崩溃的漏洞。德国经济萎缩导致欧元区经济活动停滞。以下是您需要了解的信息。【原文：Good morning. Stocks are poised to open lower after lackluster earnings in the US and in Europe. Crowdstrike has identified a bug which caused last week’s IT meltdown. And eurozone economic activity has ground to a halt thanks to a German contraction. Here’s what you need to know. — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: 赞比亚银行行长淡化 "狂热 "的非美元化计划
item.description: 赞比亚央行仍在就限制在国内交易中使用外币的计划进行磋商，央行行长丹尼-卡利亚亚（Denny Kalyalya）斥责了公开质疑这些建议的 "狂热 "批评者。【原文：Zambia’s central bank is still consulting over plans to curb the use of foreign currency in domestic transactions, with Governor Denny Kalyalya calling out a “frenzy” of critics publicly questioning the proposals.】

item.title: 俄罗斯装载第四艘被制裁的 Sovcomflot 油轮以示对西方国家的蔑视
item.description: 俄罗斯装载了国营 Sovcomflot PJSC 拥有的第四艘受制裁油轮，考验着七国集团的决心，他们正试图钳制运输莫斯科石油的船队。【原文：Russia loaded a fourth sanctioned tanker owned by state-run Sovcomflot PJSC, testing the resolve of Group of Seven nations who’re attempting to clamp down on the fleet of ships moving Moscow’s oil.】

item.title: 研究显示，非洲蕴藏着 1930 亿美元的可再生能源机遇
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，到 2031 年，撒哈拉以南非洲将有 1930 亿美元的机会投资于可再生能源和输电领域，其回报率是欧洲和美国的数倍。【原文：Sub-Saharan Africa offers a $193 billion opportunity to invest in renewable energy and transmission by 2031, with returns a multiple of those in Europe and the US, according to a new study.】

item.title: 印度称计划在未来几个月内简化商品及服务税税率制度
item.description: 印度一位高级税务官员表示，印度正在努力简化本国的销售税制度，引入三档税率，而不是现有的四档税率。【原文：India is working on simplifying the country’s sales tax regime by introducing three slabs instead of the existing four rates, a top tax official said.】

item.title: 瑞银称，瑞士联合银行丰厚利润将使派息希望永存
item.description: 瑞士联合银行（UBS）的经济学家们估计，瑞士国家银行上半年将取得丰厚的收益，从而更有可能在 2024 年向政府支付款项，此前该央行已连续两年暂停支付款项。【原文：The Swiss National Bank is set for bumper first-half earnings, making a payout to the government for 2024 more likely, economists at UBS estimate after the central bank suspended payments two years in a row.】
